original_text: Joab also and Abishai pursued after Abner: and the sun went down when they were come to the hill of Ammah, that lieth before Giah by the way of the wilderness of Gibeon.
korean_text: 요압과 아비새가 아브넬의 뒤를 쫓아 기브온 거친 땅의 길 가 기아 맞은쪽 암마 산에 이를 때에 해가 졌고

sentences.original_text: Joab also and Abishai pursued after Abner:
when they were come to the hill of Ammah,
by the way of the wilderness of Gibeon.
